full_summary:
### [2-Port Secure KVM for the Department of National Defence - Amendment 010](https://supplier-fournisseur-sspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/C07E24F1-DB86-41FF-8C31-B331A81D2278)
#### Tender Information
* Solicitation Number: 2BH3157036/A
* Department: Department of National Defence
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Notification Period: 56 days, from February 7th, 2024 to April 3rd, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired
* Publication Date: February 8th, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: April 3rd, 2024 2:00 PM EST

#### Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defence requires 380 units of two-port secure KVM (Keyboard-Video-Mouse) switches and cables. In addition, Shared Services Canada (SSC) has included 380 units of two-port secure KVM switches and cables as client options. SSC will also retain 760 two-port KVM switches and cables in the SSC ITPro Inventory for use by SSC client departments. 

Delivery will be made to Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Security Requirements

There are no specific security requirements for this tender.

#### Trade Agreements

Awarded contract will be subject to trade agreements including the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other trade agreements.
